title: Analyze Tax Impact of New Equipment Purchase
description: A business is considering buying a new piece of equipment and wants to know the tax benefits, such as Section 179 deduction.

tasks.description: Gather the cost of the new equipment.
Determine if the equipment qualifies for the Section 179 deduction or bonus depreciation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the equipment is eligible for immediate expensing under Section 179.

tasks.description: Calculate the potential tax savings from the deduction based on the business's tax bracket.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides an estimated dollar amount of tax savings for the business.
